Export.Routine:
INARTINFO #include COMSYS #include INConst ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; ANZEIGEN INFO AUS ARTIKEL ; ANZEIGE IN ARTIKELANLAGE ;Show within ; VORGABE= YKEY = ARTIKELNUMMER ; ; Inputs : ; YKEY ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 02-Sep-2008 GRF SR15804: Call form INListBundles rather than INBESTANZ ; 18-Oct-2007 shobby SRBR014511: Don't display links at the top of the screen ; if no permission defined in INVORG ; 14-Sep-2006 GRF SR15040: INVORG Macros ; 25-Aug-2006 GRF SR12027: Mark Disabled Block; quits ; 21-Jan-2006 GRF SR14074: Doco; AuthorisedList & blnAuthorised ; 09-Jan-2005 Frank SR11392: Avoiding Language text combination. ; 12-Jul-2005 GRF SR12027: Identify INARTK Product Description Use ; 31-May-2005 RobertW SR11649: Allow the user to view stock from all locations ; or this location ; 27.01.2000 DT ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new ART,AUFTRAG,AuthorisedList,BETR,blnAuthorised,CONFIGURE,LEISTUNG,LIEF,ME,MENGE new objINVORG,PAUSCHAL,PHANTOM,YII set objINVORG=$get(^INVORG(YM,YM,1)) ;BR014511 ;Q:$get(YKEY)="" SET ART=$PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",1) ;Q:ART="" set AuthorisedList = $$$INVORGOrderProcessingWithCustom(objINVORG) ; D35 ;BR014511 set blnAuthorised = $$^WWWACCESS("",AuthorisedList) ; ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; Data Records : ; SATZ objINART Item Masterfile ; LIEFSATZ objINLIEF Supplier Masterfile ; ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Item Number [ ] | ; | ; Stock: Open Orders: < > Actual Offer: <> Supplier... | <= INARTINFO ;+- Description ----------------------------------------------------------------------------+| ;| Search Name [ ] || ; | ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ WRITE YCR,"" SET PHANTOM = $$$NO SET LEISTUNG = $$$NO SET PAUSCHAL = $$$NO SET CONFIGURE = $$$NO IF ART'="" DO . NEW SATZ . SET SATZ=$GET(^INART(YM,ART,1)) . IF +$PIECE(SATZ,Y,26)=5 SET PHANTOM = $$$YES ; Phantom Item ;PHANTOM-ARTIKEL . IF +$PIECE(SATZ,Y,26)=6 SET PAUSCHAL = $$$YES ; Overall performances ;PAUSCHALE . IF +$PIECE(SATZ,Y,26)=7 SET CONFIGURE = $$$YES ; Item To Configure ;KONFIGURATIONSARTIKEL . IF +$PIECE(SATZ,Y,26)=2 SET LEISTUNG = $$$YES ; Service Item . IF +$PIECE(SATZ,Y,40)=2 SET LEISTUNG = $$$YES ; Hours . IF +$PIECE(SATZ,Y,40)=10 SET LEISTUNG = $$$YES ; Minutes . IF +$PIECE(SATZ,Y,40)=11 SET LEISTUNG = $$$YES ; Industry Minutes . ; . SET ^INDRPUSER(YM,YUSER,1)=Y_ART ;VORGABE DRP ;default DRP ;***************** EARLY QUIT ******************************************* quit:'$$^WWWACCESS($$$INVORGItemMasterDataInfo(objINVORG),"") ;BR014511 SET BETR="" ;IF +$$$INVORGAccessOtherItemLocns($GET(^INVORG(YM,YM,1)))=0 SET BETR=YLOCATION ; D67 IF +$$$INVORGViewStockFromAllLocations($GET(^INVORG(YM,YM,1)))=0 SET BETR=YLOCATION ; D218 SET MENGE=0 IF LEISTUNG'=$$$YES IF PAUSCHAL'=$$$YES IF CONFIGURE'=$$$YES SET MENGE=$$^INARTMENGE(ART,,BETR) ;WEM;24475;24.02.2004;TATSÄCHLICH VERFÜGBARER BESTAND MIT KOMMISSIONEN SET LIEF = $$^INARTLIEF(ART,4) ;LETZTEN LIEFERANTEN SET AUFTRAG = $$^INARTAUF(ART) ;AUFTRAGSMENGE EINES ARTIKELS SET ANGEBOT = $$^INARTANG(ART) ;ANGBOTSMENGE EINES ARTIKELS WRITE "" WRITE "" /* +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; "Stock: qty unit" [Red if below safety stock level] ; Tool Tip : "Display Available Stock Quantity" ; Link : form INBESTSALES ; ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ */ WRITE "" /* +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; "Open Orders: #/#/#" ; Tool Tip : "1. Customer Orders, 2. Manufacturing Orders, 3. Stock Orders" ; Link : Edit Open Orders/Demands/Supplies ; ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ */ WRITE "" /* +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; "Actual Offer: #/#/#" ; Tool Tip : "Inquiry/Offer/Cost-Based Pricing" ; Link : Edit Open Offers/Inquiries ; ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ */ WRITE "" /* +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; "Supplier..." ; Tool Tip : "Edit Suppliers Data" + supplier info ; Link : form INLIEF ; ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ */ WRITE "" . WRITE "" /* +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; "No Level In Item" -or- "Contains Level" ; Tool Tip : "Display Item Level" ; Link : form INARTT1 ; ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ */ WRITE "" /* +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; "Item is a Part" -or- "Item is not a Part" ; Tool Tip : "Display Parent Item" ; Link : form INARTIU ; ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ */ WRITE "" ; ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ WRITE "" WRITE "
" WRITE "" DO ;BESTANDSANZEIGE . NEW YBACK . KILL FERTIGUNGSNR ;WENN FERTIGUNGSNUMMER AUS UMBUCHUNG NOCH VORHANDEN ;when out of yet on hand . KILL SNANZEIGE ;WENN RÜCKSPRUNGVARIABLE AUS SN-ZUORDUNG NOCH VORHANDEN ;when out of yet on hand . SET ARTANZEIGE=$$$YES ;WENN VARIABLE AUS MANUELLER ANZEIGE NOCH VORHANDEN ;when out of Show yet on hand . IF (PHANTOM=$$$YES) || (CONFIGURE=$$$YES) DO QUIT . . WRITE "" . . IF PAUSCHAL=$$$YES WRITE $PIECE($GET(^WWW101(0,"ARTIKEL-ART",SPRACHE,5,1)),Y,1) ; Phantom Item . . IF CONFIGURE=$$$YES WRITE $PIECE($GET(^WWW101(0,"ARTIKEL-ART",SPRACHE,7,1)),Y,1) ; Item To Configure . . WRITE "" . ; . IF (LEISTUNG=$$$YES) || (PAUSCHAL=$$$YES) DO QUIT . . SET ME=$PIECE($GET(^INART(YM,ART,1)),Y,40) . . IF ME="" WRITE $PIECE($GET(^WWW101(0,"ARTIKEL-ART",SPRACHE,2,1)),Y,1) QUIT ; Service . . WRITE $PIECE($GET(^WWW101(0,"EINHEIT",SPRACHE,ME,1)),Y,1) ; Minutes, etc. . ; . IF ART'="" DO . . SET $PIECE(^INUSER(YM,YBED,1),Y,2)=ART . . WRITE "" . ; . ; D40 $$$INARTUnitofMeasure . ; D134 $$$INARTSafetyStock() . SET YII=0 . IF ART'="" IF $PIECE($GET(^INART(YM,ART,1)),Y,134)>MENGE WRITE "" SET YII=1 . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32020)_": ",$$^WWWZAHL(MENGE,0,$LENGTH($PIECE(MENGE,".",2))) ; "Stock" . IF +MENGE'=0 IF ART'="" IF $PIECE($get(^INART(YM,ART,1)),Y,40)'="" WRITE " ",$PIECE($GET(^WWW101(0,"EINHEIT",SPRACHE,$PIECE(^INART(YM,ART,1),Y,40),1)),Y,1) . IF YII=1 WRITE "" . IF ART'="" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" ;AUFTRAGSANZEIGE IF blnAuthorised DO ;KEINE BERECHTIGUNG . QUIT:PHANTOM=$$$YES . NEW YBACK . WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32078)_": ",AUFTRAG ;AUFTRAGSBESTAND ;open orders IF blnAuthorised DO ;KEINE BERECHTIGUNG . WRITE "" WRITE "    " WRITE "" WRITE "" ;ANGEBOTANZEIGE IF blnAuthorised DO ;KEINE BERECHTIGUNG . QUIT:PHANTOM=$$$YES . NEW YBACK . WRITE "" ;WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(33076)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(32169)_": ",ANGEBOT ;"Actual" + "Offer" ;ANGEBOT ;proposition ;WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(34101)_": ",ANGEBOT ;"Open Offers" ;ANGEBOT ;FIS;28.12.04;27037;EIN SPRACHENTEXT WRITE $$^WWWTEXT("IN00386")_": ",ANGEBOT ;"Actual Offer" ;ANGEBOT ;SR11392 IF blnAuthorised DO ;KEINE BERECHTIGUNG . WRITE "" WRITE "    " WRITE "" WRITE "" DO ;LIEFERANTENANZEIGE . QUIT:PHANTOM=$$$YES . WRITE "" . WRITE "" ;" . WRITE "" . . . ;IF $PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,32)=1 W "" . . . ;;;IF $PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,32)=1 Q . . . WRITE LIEF1_" "_$EXTRACT($PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,8),1,30) ;LETZTER LIEFERANT ;last supplier . . . IF +$PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,32)'=0 WRITE " ("_$PIECE($GET(^WWW101(0,"MARKIERUNG",SPRACHE,$PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,32),1)),Y,1)_")" . . . WRITE YCR . . . ;IF +$PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,32)'=0 IF $PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,32)'=1 IF COLOR'="" WRITE "" . . . ;IF $PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,32)=1 W "" . ; . WRITE $$$DBLQUOTE . WRITE " HREF="_$$$DBLQUOTE_YAKTION_"EP=WWWFORM&YFORM=INLIEF&YKEY="_LIEF1 . ;S YBACK="INART," . SET YBACK="" . DO ^WWWCGI . WRITE $$$DBLQUOTE_">" . ;WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32831)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(32022)_"..." . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32022)_"..." . WRITE "" /* . ; . ;vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv DISABLED BLOCK START . . ; . . . WRITE " " . . . DO ;INFO ATIKEL BEI LIEFEANT ;next to . . . . NEW YARTIKEL,YURL . . . . SET YURL=$PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,119) ;URL DER ARTIKELBESTÄNDE . . . . QUIT:YURL="" . . . . ; TODO : If this code is re-activated it is necessary to base on INARTK D8 instead of D1 . . . . ; see routine INARTTRACK SR12027 . . . . SET YARTIKEL=$TRANSLATE($PIECE($$$INARTKProductDescription($GET(^INARTK(YM,ART,LIEF1,1))),"|",1)," ") . . . . WRITE YCR . . . . SET YURL=YURL_YARTIKEL . . . . WRITE "" . . . . ; 32196 : "Item Information From Supplier" . . . . WRITE YCR,"" . . . . WRITE " " . . . ; . . . WRITE " " . . . IF $PIECE(LIEF,Y,YI+1)'="" WRITE "
" ;^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ DISABLED BLOCK END */ WRITE "       " WRITE "		" WRITE "" IF ART'="" DO ;I $DATA(^INARTT(YM,ART)) D ;ANZEIGE LINK ARTIKELTEILE . NEW YBACK,YPARA . SET YPARA="," ;HAUPTTEIL . WRITE "" . IF '$DATA(^INARTT(YM,ART)) WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32019) ; KEINE TEILE ;no sub-parts . IF $DATA(^INARTT(YM,ART)) WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32014) ; "ARTIKELDATEI VORHANDEN" . WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" IF ART'="" IF ART'=" " DO ;ARTIKEL SELBER EIN TEIL? ;is item a part? . NEW YBACK . WRITE "       " . WRITE "" . IF $DATA(^INARTTs(YM,1,$$^WWWUMLAU(ART,1))) WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32073) ;ARTIKEL IST EIN UNTERTEIL . IF '$DATA(^INARTTs(YM,1,$$^WWWUMLAU(ART,1))) WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32074) ;ARTIKEL IST KEIN UNTERTEIL . WRITE "" WRITE "
" /* vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv DISABLED BLOCK START ; ; "Item Parts have been changed. Please recreate structure." ; ;IF $PIECE(^INVORG(YM,YM,1),Y,121)'=1 DO ;ARTIKEL nicht UPTO DATE . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE "
" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(33274) ;ARTIKEL NICHT UPTODATE BITTE AUFBEREITUNGSLAUF STARTEN" . WRITE "" . WRITE "
" . QUIT ; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ DISABLED BLOCK END */ QUIT /* vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv DISABLED BLOCK START ; -----ALT ------- ; Old code DO ;LIEFERANTENANZEIGE . QUIT:PHANTOM=1 . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32022)_"..." . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" ;" . NEW YBACK,YKEY,YI,LIEFSATZ,COLOR,INFO . FOR YI=1:1 SET LIEF1=$PIECE(LIEF,Y,YI) QUIT:LIEF1="" DO . . IF LIEF1'="" DO . . . SET YKEY=LIEF1 . . . SET INFO="" . . . SET COLOR="" . . . SET LIEFSATZ=$GET(^INLIEF(YM,LIEF1,1)) . . . IF $PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,8)="" QUIT ;KURZBEZEICHNUNG . . . WRITE "" . . . IF +$PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,32)'=0 IF $PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,32)'=1 DO ;LIEFERANTENMERKER ;FIS,04.10.01 . . . . SET INFO=$PIECE($GET(^WWW101(0,"MARKIERUNG",SPRACHE,$PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,32),1)),Y,2) ;FARBCODE . . . . IF INFO'="" SET COLOR=$PIECE($GET(^WWW100(0,"FARBE",SPRACHE,INFO,1)),Y,1) ;FARBE AUS FARBCODE ;tincture out of . . . . IF COLOR'="" WRITE "" . . . ; . . . IF $PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,32)=1 W "" . . . WRITE $EXTRACT($PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,8),1,12) ;LETZTER LIEFERANT ;last purveyor . . . IF +$PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,32)'=0 IF $PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,32)'=1 IF COLOR'="" WRITE "" . . . IF $PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,32)=1 W "" . . . WRITE "" . . . WRITE " " . . . DO ;INFO ATIKEL BEI LIEFEANT ;next to . . . . NEW YARTIKEL,YURL . . . . SET YURL=$PIECE(LIEFSATZ,Y,119) ;URL DER ARTIKELBESTÄNDE ;URL the . . . . QUIT:YURL="" . . . . ; TODO : If this code is re-activated it is necessary to base on INARTK D8 ahead of D1 . . . . ; see routine INARTTRACK SR12027 . . . . SET YARTIKEL=$TRANSLATE($PIECE($$$INARTKProductDescription($GET(^INARTK(YM,ART,LIEF1,1))),"|",1)," ") . . . . WRITE YCR . . . . SET YURL=YURL_YARTIKEL . . . . WRITE "" . . . . WRITE YCR,"" . . . . WRITE " " . . . WRITE " " . . . IF $PIECE(LIEF,Y,YI+1)'="" WRITE "
" ; ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ DISABLED BLOCK END */
